# HEX to RGBA

Convert HEX to RGBA

## Installation
```bash
	npm install --save hex-rgba
```
or
```bash
	yarn add hex-rgba
```

## Usage
```js
	const hexToRgba = require('hex-rgba');
  const rgba = hexToRgba('#1B2B34', 40);
  // rgba will return rgba(27, 43 ,52, 0.4)
```

## Test
```bash
npm test
```
or
```bash
yarn test
```
